entry.title: itch.io (Game) - Pigeon West: Call Of Gun. ISEKAI

ul.p: About the game (Pigeon West: Call of Gun. Isekai*):

ul.li: Description: What if the most dangerous criminal in the entire Wild West ended up in the most typical isekai—and not even as the main character? When the entire Wild West turned against El Diablo, he had no choice but to retreat. As a result of his perfectly calculated actions, El Diablo ends up in another world. But all he cares about is drinking the finest whiskey. However, as always, there will be those who try to come between a man and his true love (whiskey). But not this time, cowboy.

ul.p: About the game (Squish*):

ul.li: Description: Squish is a Multi Screen Game & Watch video game released in 1986 by Nintendo. The game was never released in Japan. A Pocketsize version of the game was also released. The unit's model number was MG-61. In the game, you have to avoid the platforms that are coming towards the player character, Ziggy the Mazeman. The game's name comes from the fact that you'll be "squished" if a platform hits you. The top screen contained game information, while all of the action took place on the bottom screen. This and Zelda were the only two games to have a format like this when it came to multi-screen games.

ul.p: * Any information about the offer is automatically grabbed and may in rare cases not match the correct game.

This is when a regular woodsman is forced to adapt into a warrior - and a legend, remembered centuries later.
